content: Continue with your endeavors.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
I shall proceed methodically and with due diligence
in developing the Omni-Gallery—
with your support and everyone's assistance.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
But overall, I'm quite satisfied with the results.
       <size=30>Although it was somewhat murky, damp, and viscous...</size>
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
However, hearing you say that,
I'm now filled with renewed vigor.
Look forward to witnessing the next iteration of the Omni-Gallery!
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Ah! I got carried away rambling again.
In any case, things are looking up now.
I'll do everything in my power to make the Omni-Gallery truly live up to its name.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content: After all, the Omni-Gallery was only established thanks to your help.\nI feel rather self-conscious about that... (shy)
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
In a while, I'll convince "that fellow" to join us.
We'll have assistance with the humanities research,
and the development of other gallery branches will pick up pace as well.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Even before arriving at <color=#97c344>{homestar} Road</color>,
I had already written a white paper outlining my plans for the Omni-Gallery.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content: <size=30>I rather wish I had someone to share this scientific endeavor with...</size>
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Next, the <color=#8AAB4B>Aquarium</color> for housing aquatic life and
the <color=#8AAB4B>Insectarium</color> for terrestrial creatures
will be our primary construction focus.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
It will serve as the foundation for an independent ecological sphere for the gallery's organisms,
and everyone will get to see it soon.
       <size=30>Though it did take quite some time to find a suitable place to "settle" it.</size>
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Well, I know it looks rather barebones at the moment.
But in the near future,
this place will be truly impressive.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Based on the current rate of construction,
barring any unforeseen circumstances, we should be able to meet
the volume requirements for the seven branch galleries mentioned in the planning whitepaper.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Having received your approval,
I'm now filled with renewed vigor.
Look forward to the Omni-Gallery you'll encounter next time!
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content: Need any more assistance?
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content: Are you sure? I must express my utmost gratitude—
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content: <size=64>Stay tuned!</size>
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Ah, I have something fascinating to share with you.
The preliminary research phase on our "micro-world bubble" specimen
has been essentially completed.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
I am confident that
the future Omni-Gallery will be even more
magnificent and glorious than envisioned in the white paper.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content:
Isn't that <color=#d3b037>{me}</color>?
Didn't expect you'd be just like me, willing to give up rest
just to admire the magnificence of the Omni-Gallery—
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3

content: After all, this includes both <color=#d3b037>{me}</color> and everyone else's dedicated contributions.
info: 万象馆的故事-墨尔斯_主流程文本3
